p: Based on these data, we can state that the medical ethnobotany of the Catalan-speaking territories scrutinised is distributed in 120 botanical families of vascular plants (seven to pteridophytes, five to gymnosperms and 108 to angiosperms). These families include 894 taxa, with medicinal uses, of which 41 have only been determined at generic level (the remaining majority, at specific and infraspecific levels).
